description:
New course on photo manipulation.

This course is for beginners to intermediate students, who have basic knowledge on Photoshop operation, but new to the art of photo-manipulation. Those who have some knowledge on the subject can also join. 

Course project is done in Photoshop CS6. Any newer or older (Not older than CS4) version of Photoshop will do for this course.

Photo manipulation works are a great way to create many different projects such as, wall papers, book covers, magazine covers, advertisements (print or web) etc. Also in matte paintings, similar tactics are used. 

So either for personal artistic satisfaction or for professional skills, this field has much to offer.

In this course, you will learn,

  • How to brainstorm an idea to suit a topic for photo-manipulation project
  • Finding suitable images
  • How to use different images and join them in one
  • How to edit all the different types of images to make them look like they are part of same image
  • How the photo editing and manipulation process flow works

I will be there to guide you in every steps of this course. So have a great time learning.
title: Digital Photo Manipulation Art And Cover Design In PhotoShop
